>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/products/search/keywords"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



## 부가설명 및 특이사항
            
상품번호를 통해 어드민에 등록된 검색어를 조회하는 API 입니다.

 ### OAUTH2 참고사항
* [Oauth2 API](https://docs.shopby.co.kr/?url.primaryName=auth/#/OAUTH2/post-oauth2-token) 를 사용하여 토큰을 발급받은 경우,
* 기존 accessToken 대신 Shop-By-Authorization 로 액세스 토큰을 전달해야합니다.
* ex) Shop-By-Authorization : Bearer test-access-token


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"productNos","in":"query","description":"상품 번호","required":true,"schema":{"type":"number"},"example":"100000, 100001"},{"name":"Version","in":"header","description":"API 버전","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"1.0"},{"name":"clientId","in":"header","description":"쇼핑몰 클라이언트 아이디","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"test-client-id"},{"name":"platform","in":"header","description":"클라이언트 플랫폼(PC, MOBILE_WEB, AOS, IOS)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"PC"},{"name":"language","in":"header","description":"언어 (기본값: ko, 지원: en - 영어, jp - 일본어, zh - 중국어) (nullable)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"en"},{"name":"accessToken","in":"header","description":"회원 엑세스 토큰(Oauth2 스펙) (nullable)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"Bearer test-access-token"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"200","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","description":"","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"keywords":{"type":"array","description":"검색어","example":"[검색어1, 검색어2]","items":{"oneOf":[{"type":"object"},{"type":"boolean"},{"type":"string"},{"type":"number"}]}},"productNo":{"type":"number","description":"상품번호","example":100000}}},"title":"products-search-keywords226225576"},"examples":{"get-product-keywords":{"value":"[{\"productNo\":100000,\"keywords\":[\"검색어1\",\"검색어2\"]}]"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
